#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,d;
		string x;
		cin>>x;
		cin>>d;
		n=x.length();
		for(int i = d-1; i < n; i++) cout<<x[i];
		if((n-d+1)%2)
			for (int i = d-2 ; i >=0 ; i--) cout<<x[i];
		else
			for (int i = 0; i < d-1; i++) cout<<x[i];
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
